document_data.name: Phostral
document_data.mainbody: '''Phostral''' was a warrior in the [[Frostfire Banner]] adventuring party during the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He was immense, but had a fitting set of armor and a sword.
document_data.History:
Phostral was a member of the Frostfire Banner when they took on High Duke [[Horostos]]'s assignment to search for the reason why all animals larger than one's hand, as well as most people, were vanishing on the road between [[Starmantle]] and [[Ripplestones]].

They were ambushed on their first night out of Starmantle by a chiming mist, [[Saeraede Lyonora|the Slayer]], which killed most of the party. He woke up when [[Paeregur]] called everyone awake; only he and [[Lhaerand]] were still alive at that point. Seeing the mist, Phostral tried to parry, but the entity swung into him, and reduced him to dust inside his armor.
